alert.note: Alert for Alger; Delta; Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 7:28PM EDT until July 10 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Delta County in south central Upper Michigan... Schoolcraft County in east central Upper Michigan... Southwestern Alger County in north central Upper Michigan... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 728 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles west of Steuben, or 13 miles south of Munising, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Munising, Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, Au Train, Germfask, Seney, M-94 between Steuben and Manistique, Blaney Park, Shingleton, Steuben, M-28 between Shingleton and Seney, Christmas and Chicago Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
